contents.item: Don’t invest everything in another man’s calling
Your gift or calling enables you to ask the question of what to do
Life should be used to fulfill the purposes of the Kingdom
You need to live a life of service to make your life an effective one
God appreciates ordinary people
You have to be skillful in your time management to be effective in life
All products are a multiplication of time invested
You need focus and concentration to be effective in life
Survival isn’t all there is to life
We all have the potential to be great and the seed of greatness
The nature of God is that we welcome and celebrate one another
Always be organized in adding value
We glorify God when we celebrate people’s gifts
No amount of money can compensate losing your purpose
You need to understand the principle of intensity to reclaim time
You only work right when you are fulfilling the essence of your creation
Serving people with love and compassion is the best way to bring them to Christ
It is our responsibility as believers to bring the will of God to the people
You need to combine your calling with your passion
The effectiveness of your life is not determined by the duration of your life
Employment is a major time killer
Always reveal the nature of God to people
Always live in the here and now
We were sent to earth to fulfill our mandate and life’s purpose
Life is supposed to be used in fulfilling our individual purposes of creation
Don’t neglect your calling all in the name of employment
Time is wasted when it is not being converted
To live a selfish life is the fastest track to catastrophe
Having a job is being busy
An effective life is not determined by how long you lived
Everyone deserves to be in our fellowship
God is connected to people
We glorify God when we appreciate humans
Until you believe in yourself, it does not matter how much you believe in God
The effectiveness of your life is determined by how much impact you make
Brotherly love should be our number one principle as believers
Your calling should bless and affect the lives of others for good
The secret of effective living is detachment
Life is a service. Serve in the grace of strength within thy soul.
Purpose is the most important thing worth living for
If you are not living in active consciousness, you will always be lost
A steward in the above scripture is a servant who serves.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Your net worth determines how valuable you are in the sight of men
You values are your life’s worth
Employment wastes the productive time of our lives
There is no limitation in God
Live your life for the advancement of the Kingdom
Stop trying to make a living and begin to live
To help people is to help God
An effective life is a selfless one
Don't mistake activity with achievement.
You have to lift a person up before you can really put them in their place.
Appreciate and find ways to invest in yourself
Our service as believers is in our help and attitude towards others
The totality of your commitment will make you more efficient
Nothing exists in isolation there is a purpose for everything
The way we relate with people is the same way we relate with God
God is in your neighbor
The principle of God is love
Only loving people who love you isn’t profitable
When we allow people to fellowship with us, God welcomes us into fellowshipping with Him
Service to humanity has no alternative
Life is given to be invested in multiplying
Everything looks for you when you become great
Your calling is in what you often think about
Do not restrain yourself from fellowshipping with people, regardless of their age or status
We disqualify ourselves from communicating with God when we refuse to open our hearts to people
You cannot find God without finding people
Celebrate God daily by celebrating His creation
Use your knowledge and physical strength. You have the opportunity today, start living for Him
Every service is a product of double honor
Love is about sharing
Work is an instrument for fulfilling purpose
The primary thing that determines how effective your life is how you carry out your calling
Reflect and meditate on yourself and discover ways to multiply yourself
You have to be pragmatic, purposeful and goal-oriented to be fully effective
The only way to practicalize your love for God is by helping and loving others
Employment is the biggest form of slavery
We should be blessings to others as believers
The only need of God is in people
Learn to do everything with speed to be efficient and effective
You need speed to regain your lost years
God needs are in the needs of people
Our attitude to others dictates God’s attitude to us
Love others the way God loves you
Work is a means to fulfill your heavenly mandate
Time is the content of life
Service to God is largely unacceptable without service to men
The purpose of the Kingdom is the essence of life
Your calling is buried in your background and life experience
